```{R}
land <- read.csv("data/LandUsePer_BM_2023_cartoISea.csv", header = TRUE, sep = "\t")
head(land)
```

```{R}
# Create a static map of the land use data using the following columns from the data frame:
#"X", "Y", "BufferSize", with coordinate in lambert 2 étendu format (do the conversion to lat/long)

library(ggplot2)

# Convert the coordinates (X AND Y) from lambert 93 to lat/long 
land$lon <- (land$X - 700000) / 10000
land$lat <- (land$Y - 6600000) / 10000

# Create a static map of the land use data using the following columns from the data frame:
#"X", "Y", "BufferSize", with coordinate in lambert 2 étendu format (do the conversion to lat/long)

ggplot(land, aes(x = land$lon, y = land$lat)) +
  geom_point(aes(size = land$BufferSize), alpha = 0.5) +
  scale_size_continuous(range = c(1, 10)) +
  labs(title = "Land use data", x = "Longitude", y = "Latitude")
```
